title: Patrick Prunty
description: Software developer, writer, and amateur explorer
author: Patrick Prunty

body.raw:
# Patrick Prunty [#patrick-prunty] Hi! I'm Patrickâ€”a senior software engineer at [UnitedHealth Group / Optum](https://optum.com). This is my little corner of the web where I share my work with y'all. In my spare time, I [write on Substack](https://furrycircuits.substack.com/), train for triathlons, and tinker around with all sorts of random computer stuff. I'm always happy to connect with like-minded people. Feel free to reach out via [email](mailto:patrickprunty.business@gmail.com) or on [X](https://x.com/intent/follow?screen_name=pprunty_&original_referer=https://patrickprunty.com/). # Where [#where] # Writing [#writing] I explore the evolving landscape of technology through [Furry Circuits](https://furrycircuits.substack.com/), my Substack publication. I write about artificial intelligence, computer programming, and the human side of building technology. If you're new, try ["The Engineer's Proclivity for Perfection"](https://furrycircuits.substack.com/p/the-engineers-proclivity-for-perfection) or or browse one of my [weekly newsletters](https://furrycircuits.substack.com/s/weekly-newsletter). Subscribe # Projects [#projects]
Projects [#projects]} items={[ { title: 'Pixel Projects at YouTube', url: 'https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC5OToaksgWe-pjkgqPkUZkw?sub_confirmation=1', year: '(Coming 2025)', media: [ '/images/projects/pp3.webp', '/images/projects/GodelIncompleteness.mp4', ], description: 'Animated YouTube series making math and computer programming fun and accessible.', }, { title: 'Patrick Prunty at YouTube', url: 'https://www.youtube.com/@pprunty?sub_confirmation=1', year: '2025', youtubeIds: [ 'eVjP9Vnh2xE', ], youtubeThumbnails: [ '/images/projects/pokemon.png', ], hide: false, description: 'Experimental art examining pop culture and media through re-contextualization, visual/audio mashing, and other mixed-media approaches.', }, { title: 'Jigsaw Presents at YouTube', url: 'https://www.youtube.com/@JigsawPresents?sub_confirmation=1', year: '(Coming Soon)', media: ['/images/projects/jigsaw-presents.webp'], description: 'Providing insight into trending films and television series through video essays.', hide: true, }, { title: 'deltacomponents.dev', url: 'https://deltacomponents.dev/', year: '(Work in progress)', media: [ '/images/projects/dc/radio-input.mp4', '/images/projects/dc/mouse-string-connection.mp4', '/images/projects/dc/highlighter.mp4', '/images/projects/dc/font-transform.mp4', ], description: <>A custom shadcn registry featuring open-source, customizable UI components. Designed for seamless integration with v0 and Next.js / React.js projects. }, { title: 'tmplate.xyz', url: 'https://tmplate.xyz/', year: '2025', description: 'A free, full-featured Next.js SaaS starter template with authentication, payments, email, and content management built-in using modern tools like Supabase, Stripe, and Tailwind CSS.', media: ['/images/projects/tmplate.webp'] }, { title: 'magikarp', url: 'https://github.com/pprunty/magikarp', year: '(Work in progress)', description: 'A Golang-based framework for building customizable, plugin-based LLM agents. Designed for developers who need flexible AI integration.' }, { title: 'manim-interactive', url: 'https://github.com/pprunty/manim-interactive', year: '2025', description: "Interactive Manim environment for seamless mathematical animations, replicating 3Blue1Brown's workflow.", hide: true, }, { title: 'motormongo (archived)', url: 'https://motormongo.readthedocs.io/en/latest/', year: '2023', description: <>Async MongoDB object-document mapper. It provides a simple, non-blocking API for Python apps. Install it with: pip install motormongo., }, ]} /> # Connect [#connect] # Photos [#photos]
